page.title: 17ST.MARYS CHURCH
page.content:
It is not really known why two churches _ St.Marys and St.Peters were built in Barton.Initially there were certainly not two parishes.
{ St.Marys church}was built in the 12th century in the fashionable Gothic style of this time.Since it has been built it has undergone many alterations.The earliest part of the present building is the North Isle arcade,which was built in the 12th century.Soon afterwards probably still before 1200 A.D,South Isle was built. Its ornate designs tell of the prosperity of the town in this period. Nowadays,St.Marys church is used for Weddings,Christenings and Funerals as well as Holy Communions and fund raising events.It is a lively,and caring aspect of the community.
